snippet: Leaders of the Apostolic Church, which has outlasted conquest, genocide and government-imposed atheism, are confronting challenges like entrenched secularism and disaffection with organized religion.
abstract: Echmiadzin Journal; Armenian Apostolic Church leaders gather in Echmiadzin, Armenia, for rare bishop's conference; group hopes to put aside differences and tackle shared challenges of entrenched secularism at home, assimilation of followers in large Armenian diaspora abroad and general disaffection with organized religion.
lead_paragraph: Leaders of the Apostolic Church, which has outlasted conquest, genocide and government-imposed atheism, are confronting challenges like entrenched secularism and disaffection with organized religion.

headline.main: Armenian Church, Survivor of the Ages, Faces Modern Hurdles
headline.print_headline: A Faithful Survivor of the Ages in Armenia Faces Modern Hurdles
